revised_title: The Process of Excitation in Nerve and Muscle: An Analysis of the Local Excitatory Process
tldr: The author examines the process of excitation in nerve and muscle, focusing on the local excitatory process and the role of narcotics in altering nerve conductivity and excitability. The study reveals that the apparent dissociation of these processes in earlier stages of narcosis may be illusory, and that both conductivity and excitability are affected by narcotics.
